name: Corel Quattro Pro 7 and 8 File
summary: Learn about .WB3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Microsoft Excel 2003 can convert WB3 spreadsheets into .XLS and .XLSX files if the Quattro Pro file converter is installed. However, Excel 2007 and later no longer support WB3 files.
NOTE: The WB3 file extension is used by Quattro Pro 7 and 8.

description: File created by Quattro Pro, a spreadsheet program included with Corel WordPerfect Office; contains data, charts, calculations, and scripts in a grid of spreadsheet cells; typically used for common business tasks or in personal finance.
